players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I believe we should focus on finding the culprit who killed Bob last night. Let's work together and share any information we have to help identify the mafia among us."
Diana: "I agree with Charlie. Let's focus on finding the person who killed Bob last night. I believe that open communication and sharing information will help us uncover the truth."
You: "I remember seeing Bob and Charlie talking quite intensely before the night of the incident. It was late and dark, but I couldn't help but notice their body language from my window."
Diana: "I remember seeing Bob and Charlie talking quite intensely before the night of the incident. It was late and dark, but I couldn't help but notice their body language from my window."

Charlie: "I would like to remind everyone that we are all working towards the same goal of identifying the mafia among us. Based on Alice's and my observations, I believe it is important for us to consider Charlie as a potential suspect due to his suspicious behavior before Bob..."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Charlie
